Here's a glimpse at some real projects I've worked on. From applied artificial intelligence to mobile apps, each one reflects my way of solving problems.
Web portal that generates personalized dietary plans with artificial intelligence and lets you save them to follow your nutrition plan.
Web application to manage your annual accounts, track income and expenses, and run financial simulations.
Minimalist mobile calendar app for jotting down and managing tasks in a simple and intuitive way.
Development and maintenance of a platform for a virtual classroom with a lot of user traffic, many realtime interactions, and integrations with AI.
Development and maintenance of various applications for clients such as Generalitat de Catalunya, customer interaction, and team leader for a software application.
Internship, development of a reservation and personnel management API for a barbershop, as well as obtaining a Udemy certificate in Spring Boot.
Higher Technical Degree in web application development.
